languages.text: "Следом за мон-кай по имени Каллигос Винтерскейл. Даже червь может навредить раненному тигру, занеся инфекцию в уже зияющую рану. А раны моего народа... кровоточат с гибели Крудараха. Душам моих собратьев необходима припарка, надежда. А не занесенный меч палача".

traits.locale_text: "Следом за мон-кай по имени Каллигос Винтерскейл. Даже червь может навредить раненному тигру, занеся инфекцию в уже зияющую рану. А раны моего народа... кровоточат с гибели Крудараха. Душам моих собратьев необходима припарка, надежда. А не занесенный меч палача".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "On the trail of a mon-keigh called Calligos Winterscale. Even a worm may harm a wounded tiger by bringing infection into an open wound. And the wounds of my people... have been bleeding ever since Crudarach's demise. The spirits of my kin need a poultice, a hope. Not the executioner's sword already poised to fall."
languages.original_text: "Следом за мон-кай по имени Каллигос Винтерскейл. Даже червь может навредить раненному тигру, занеся инфекцию в уже зияющую рану. А раны моего народа... кровоточат с гибели Крудараха. Душам моих собратьев необходима припарка, надежда. А не занесенный меч палача".

languages.text: “我要去找一个叫做卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的猴子。即便是卑微的虫子，也可以通过感染伤口，对受伤的老虎造成伤害。而我的族人们的伤口……自从克鲁达拉赫陷落之后，就一直在流着血。我的族人的灵魂需要的是药膏，是希望，而不是行刑者手中高高举起的利剑。”
languages.original_text: "On the trail of a mon-keigh called Calligos Winterscale. Even a worm may harm a wounded tiger by bringing infection into an open wound. And the wounds of my people... have been bleeding ever since Crudarach's demise. The spirits of my kin need a poultice, a hope. Not the executioner's sword already poised to fall."

traits.locale_text: “我要去找一个叫做卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的猴子。即便是卑微的虫子，也可以通过感染伤口，对受伤的老虎造成伤害。而我的族人们的伤口……自从克鲁达拉赫陷落之后，就一直在流着血。我的族人的灵魂需要的是药膏，是希望，而不是行刑者手中高高举起的利剑。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "On the trail of a mon-keigh called Calligos Winterscale. Even a worm may harm a wounded tiger by bringing infection into an open wound. And the wounds of my people... have been bleeding ever since Crudarach's demise. The spirits of my kin need a poultice, a hope. Not the executioner's sword already poised to fall."

languages.text: «Tras el rastro de un mon-keigh llamado Calligos Winterscale. Incluso un gusano puede herir a un tigre herido infectando una herida abierta. Y las heridas de mi gente... no han dejado de sangrar desde la perdición de Crudarach. Los espíritus de mis hermanos necesitan una cura, una esperanza, no la espada del verdugo sobre sus cabezas».
languages.original_text: "On the trail of a mon-keigh called Calligos Winterscale. Even a worm may harm a wounded tiger by bringing infection into an open wound. And the wounds of my people... have been bleeding ever since Crudarach's demise. The spirits of my kin need a poultice, a hope. Not the executioner's sword already poised to fall."

traits.locale_text: «Tras el rastro de un mon-keigh llamado Calligos Winterscale. Incluso un gusano puede herir a un tigre herido infectando una herida abierta. Y las heridas de mi gente... no han dejado de sangrar desde la perdición de Crudarach. Los espíritus de mis hermanos necesitan una cura, una esperanza, no la espada del verdugo sobre sus cabezas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケール と呼ばれるモン＝ケイを追ってきた。虫ですらも手負いの虎を害する可能性はあるものだ。開いた傷口に感染をもたらすことによってな。クルダラの死以来、我が一族の傷は血を流し続けている。同胞の魂には湿布が、希望が必要だ。処刑人の剣ではなくな」
languages.original_text: "On the trail of a mon-keigh called Calligos Winterscale. Even a worm may harm a wounded tiger by bringing infection into an open wound. And the wounds of my people... have been bleeding ever since Crudarach's demise. The spirits of my kin need a poultice, a hope. Not the executioner's sword already poised to fall."

traits.locale_text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケール と呼ばれるモン＝ケイを追ってきた。虫ですらも手負いの虎を害する可能性はあるものだ。開いた傷口に感染をもたらすことによってな。クルダラの死以来、我が一族の傷は血を流し続けている。同胞の魂には湿布が、希望が必要だ。処刑人の剣ではなくな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Auf der Fährte eines Chem-Pan-Sey namens Calligos Winterzunder. Selbst ein Wurm kann einem verwundeten Tiger schaden, indem er eine Infektion in eine offene Wunde trägt. Und die Wunden meines Volks ... bluten seit Crudarachs Niedergang. Die Seelen meines Volkes benötigen einen heilsamen Wickel, eine Hoffnung. Nicht das Schwert des Henkers, das nur darauf wartet, hinabzusausen."
languages.original_text: "On the trail of a mon-keigh called Calligos Winterscale. Even a worm may harm a wounded tiger by bringing infection into an open wound. And the wounds of my people... have been bleeding ever since Crudarach's demise. The spirits of my kin need a poultice, a hope. Not the executioner's sword already poised to fall."

traits.locale_text: "Auf der Fährte eines Chem-Pan-Sey namens Calligos Winterzunder. Selbst ein Wurm kann einem verwundeten Tiger schaden, indem er eine Infektion in eine offene Wunde trägt. Und die Wunden meines Volks ... bluten seit Crudarachs Niedergang. Die Seelen meines Volkes benötigen einen heilsamen Wickel, eine Hoffnung. Nicht das Schwert des Henkers, das nur darauf wartet, hinabzusausen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Sur la piste d'un mon-keigh nommé Calligos Winterscale. Même un ver peut nuire à un tigre blessé en infectant une plaie ouverte, et les blessures de mon peuple... n'ont pas cessé de saigner depuis la perte de Crudarach. Les esprits de mes semblables ont besoin d'un cataplasme, d'un espoir, pas de l'épée du bourreau qui menace de s'abattre à tout moment. »
languages.original_text: "On the trail of a mon-keigh called Calligos Winterscale. Even a worm may harm a wounded tiger by bringing infection into an open wound. And the wounds of my people... have been bleeding ever since Crudarach's demise. The spirits of my kin need a poultice, a hope. Not the executioner's sword already poised to fall."

traits.locale_text: « Sur la piste d'un mon-keigh nommé Calligos Winterscale. Même un ver peut nuire à un tigre blessé en infectant une plaie ouverte, et les blessures de mon peuple... n'ont pas cessé de saigner depuis la perte de Crudarach. Les esprits de mes semblables ont besoin d'un cataplasme, d'un espoir, pas de l'épée du bourreau qui menace de s'abattre à tout moment. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Calligos Winterscale adındaki bir mon-keigh'in peşine düşeceğim. Bir solucan bile açık yarasını iltihaplandırarak yaralı bir kaplana zarar verebilir. Halkımın yaralarının ise... Crudarach'ın yok oluşundan beri kanaması durmuyor. Soydaşlarımın ruhlarını saracak bir sargı, bir tutam umut gerek. İnmeye dünden razı bir infazcı kılıcına gerek yok."
languages.original_text: "On the trail of a mon-keigh called Calligos Winterscale. Even a worm may harm a wounded tiger by bringing infection into an open wound. And the wounds of my people... have been bleeding ever since Crudarach's demise. The spirits of my kin need a poultice, a hope. Not the executioner's sword already poised to fall."

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterscale adındaki bir mon-keigh'in peşine düşeceğim. Bir solucan bile açık yarasını iltihaplandırarak yaralı bir kaplana zarar verebilir. Halkımın yaralarının ise... Crudarach'ın yol oluşundan beri kanaması durmuyor. Soydaşlarımın ruhlarını saracak bir sargı, bir tutam umut gerek. İnmeye dünden razı bir infazcı kılıcına gerek yok."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
